titleStmt.title: Col: Lilburnes letter to a friend: published to vindicate his aspersed reputation.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, Robert, 1613-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Printing-Presse in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, at the sign of the Printing-Presse in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange
